statements: SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policy;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy WHERE id = 1;
SELECT policy_name FROM data_retention_policy WHERE retention_period > 30;
SELECT id, policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policy ORDER BY retention_period DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy ORDER BY retention_period DESC, policy_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policy WHERE retention_period > 30 ORDER BY retention_period ASC
SELECT id, policy_name FROM data_retention_policy WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy WHERE policy_name LIKE '%retention%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM data_retention_policy
SELECT * FROM retention_policies;
SELECT policy_id, retention_period, regulation_type FROM retention_policies WHERE retention_period > 10;
SELECT log_id, policy_id, action, timestamp FROM policy_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(*) FROM policy_logs GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT * FROM policy_logs WHERE action = 'DELETE' AND timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM retention_policies WHERE retention_period > 365;
SELECT policy_id, retention_period FROM retention_policies WHERE regulation_type = 'GDPR';
SELECT DISTINCT policy_id, retention_period, regulation_type FROM retention_policies ORDER BY retention_period DESC;
SELECT policy_id, AVG(retention_period) AS avg_retention_period FROM retention_policies GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM policy_logs GROUP BY policy_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM retention_policies;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_id = 1;
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_id = 2;
SELECT policy_id, requirement_id FROM policy_requirements ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM retention_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies WHERE retention_period > 5;
SELECT r.requirement_name, p.policy_name FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN policy_requirements pr ON r.requirement_id = pr.requirement_id JOIN retention_policies p ON pr.policy_id = p.policy_id;
SELECT p.policy_name, COUNT(pr.requirement_id) AS requirement_count FROM policy_requirements pr JOIN retention_policies p ON pr.policy_id = p.policy_id GROUP BY p.policy_id;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies ORDER BY retention_period DESC, policy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM retention_policies;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies ORDER BY retention_period ASC;
SELECT table_name, retention_status FROM data_to_retain WHERE retention_status = TRUE;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies WHERE policy_id = 2;

SELECT audit_logs.log_id, audit_logs.action_taken, data_to_retain.retention_status FROM audit_logs INNER JOIN data_to_retain ON audit_logs.data_id = data_to_retain.data_id ORDER BY audit_logs.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM retention_policies;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT table_name, retention_policy_id FROM tables_to_keep WHERE retention_policy_id = 2;
SELECT data_id, retention_status FROM data_to_retain WHERE retention_status = true;
SELECT log_id, action_taken, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM retention_policy_table;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policy_table WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policy_columns ORDER BY data_type DESC;
SELECT key_name, encryption_algorithm FROM encryption_keys WHERE policy_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM retention_policy_table;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policy_table WHERE retention_period > 10;
SELECT policy_columns.column_name,encryption_keys.key_name FROM policy_columns INNER JOIN encryption_keys ON policy_columns.policy_id = encryption_keys.policy_id;
SELECT audit_logs.event_type,audit_logs.event_timestamp,access_control.username FROM audit_logs INNER JOIN access_control ON audit_logs.policy_id = access_control.policy_id;
SELECT user_id,username,role FROM access_control WHERE role = 'Admin';
